Metaweb01 is a tool used to test [http://www.freebase.com Freebase]

= About =
This tool fetchs data from [http://www.freebase.com Freebase] and create a XUL based timeline.

[http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2012/2264306553_9933aa3f38.jpg]

See also this blog entry [http://plindenbaum.blogspot.com/2008/02/freebase-and-history-of-sciences.html]

= How To =
compilation

  ant freebase

running

  java -jar build/freebase.jar

options:

 * -d <dir> save to directory (required)
 * -c <string> metaweb cookie (required)
 * -u <string> base url where the file will be hosted
